TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ExtensionDataObject extends System.Object

summary.span: 存储已经通过添加新成员扩展的版本化数据协定中的数据。

span.span: Stores data from a versioned data contract that has been extended by adding new members.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个用于存储 在反序列化操作期间遇到的额外数据的结构。The is the structure that stores extra data encountered by the during deserialization operations. 序列化过程使用该结构将额外数据写入序列化的实例中。The structure is used by serialization to write the extra data into the serialized instance. 该结构由 接口的 属性返回。The structure is returned by the property of the interface. ## Examples 下面的代码序列化了一个类型 (`PersonVersion2`) 的实例，该类型是可序列化类型 (`Person`) 的第二个版本。The following code serializes an instance of a type (`PersonVersion2`) that is the second version of the serializable type (`Person`). 第二个版本包含第一个版本中没有的额外数据（`ID` 字段）。The second version contains extra data (`ID` field) that is not present in the first version. 然后，代码将 XML 文档反序列化到 `Person` 对象中，再立即重新序列化该包含额外数据的对象。The code then deserializes the XML document into a `Person` object, then immediately reserializes the object including the extra data. 最后，代码将新的 XML 反序列化到 `PersonVersion2` 对象中，并将全部数据写入控制台，以表明数据已经在该类型的现有版本和早期版本之间往返了一次。Finally, the code deserializes the new XML into a `PersonVersion2` object and writes the complete data to the console, proving that the data has made a round trip to and from an older version of the type. 请注意，应用 属性 (Attribute) 时，必须将 和 属性 (Property) 设置为与原始类相同的名称和命名空间。Note that the attribute must be applied with the and properties set to the same name and namespace as the original class. [!code-csharp[IUnknownSerializationData#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/iunknownserializationdata/cs/iunknownserialization.cs#0)] [!code-vb[IUnknownSerializationData#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/iunknownserializationdata/vb/iunknownserialization.vb#0)]
